outcome: Council factions struggle for control after Halden's death and system failures intensify.

events.description: The Harmonists propose reverting to earlier BCI models to restore stability, sparking internal debate.
The Innovators pressure the Council to deploy experimental algorithms, exacerbating existing dysfunctions.
The Directorate mobilizes security forces quietly to preempt potential civil unrest and assert control.
A leaked document reveals internal Council struggles, causing public distrust and sporadic protests.
